I am writing a little, as I can, on the Life of Christ, but other topics come in with my labor to which I am obliged to give thought and trace upon paper. . . .I am doing considerably more in the writing line than when at 


                                 -13- 

Battle Creek. I think the atmosphere is some better here [South Lancaster] than at Battle Creek.--Letter 108, 1890, pp. 1, 3.
